        public void setName(java.lang.String newName)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the name of the item. The items name cannot be null or the empty string
        Parameters:

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice(int newPrice)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the price of the item. Item price must be greater than 0
        Parameters:
        newPrice - item's new price
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - newPrice is less than 0
